message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable. How about $130?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to pay a fair price for the product, but I'd like to save some money if possible.
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my price reflects the true value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $120?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $115?
